oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Why we know what we know and why they do what they do!
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ormston, William
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of this lecture is to examine why so much knowlÂ­edge has been kept quiet and why some of the treatments we learned in veterinary school ignore the laws of nature that we learned and memorized so that we could get into veterinary school.
